actionButtons.label: Debug Code
actionButtons.defaultPrompt: I need help debugging my code. Can you analyze the following code and help me identify and fix any issues?
actionButtons.description: Automatically detects bugs, generates fixes, and adds intelligent logging

actionButtons.label: Ask Question
actionButtons.defaultPrompt: I have a question about my codebase. Can you help me understand how to implement or optimize the following?
actionButtons.description: Ask anything about your codebase with context-aware analysis

actionButtons.label: Generate Docs
actionButtons.defaultPrompt: Please generate comprehensive documentation for my code including inline comments, API references, and usage examples.
actionButtons.description: Generates and updates project documentation and inline comments

actionButtons.label: Architecture Planning
actionButtons.defaultPrompt: I need help designing a scalable architecture for my project. Can you help me plan the technical roadmap and best practices?
actionButtons.description: Designs scalable architectures and technical roadmaps

actionButtons.label: PR Review
actionButtons.defaultPrompt: Please review my code changes and provide detailed feedback with suggestions for improvements and automated test recommendations.
actionButtons.description: Creates and reviews pull requests with detailed comments

prompts: Generate a FastAPI boilerplate with authentication
Create a Next.js project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
Set up a microservices architecture with Docker
Create unit tests for my existing functions
Generate API endpoints for CRUD operations
Build a React component with proper TypeScript types
Optimize my database queries for better performance
Find and fix memory leaks in my application
Add proper error handling and logging
